Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! I've been away since 0.15 and I had some really awesome parts packs back then. Unfortunately I had to to a clean install of windows and forgot about KSP, so they're gone now. I remember I had really cool stuff to build lunar bases and satellites with. I already got the NovaPunch remix pack, which is awesome, but I really miss these said parts. I remember building massive satellites that went up to keosynchronous orbit on even larger rockets... If anyone knows what those addon packs were called I'd really appreciate that

Currently I've put Jeb and Bill on Mun and I'm looking to establish a lunar base and a proper satellite network around Kerbin before continuing to more distant worlds.

Cheers!

Well, you didn't describe what the parts look like, only what you did with them

If you post what they look like, someone is bound to know what you're talking about.

Okay, well, let me try to describe... The stuff that I made my lunar bases with had these large structural parts, all shapes and sizes. There was also an inflatable part... The satellites had these solar panels that slowly packed themselves open. I'm not really looking for a specific parts pack, just something to do similar things / have similar parts.

Edit: I actually found something cool on /vg/, anyone know where these parts are from?

http://images.4chan.org/vg/src/1349240133674.png

http://images.4chan.org/vg/src/1349285460272.png

http://images.4chan.org/vg/src/1349286375938.png

Edited October 5, 2012 by Tobu91

I know it uses parts from this and this. I dont know were the pannels are from, and i know that the pannels you are looking for (the ones that deployed) are outdated.

also if you want to do a satelite network let me recomend this, lets you set a real network to controll Unmanne /RC vehicles with some realistic delay

also if you want to do a satelite network let me recomend this, lets you set a real network to controll Unmanne /RC vehicles with some realistic delay

These are some nice packs. I finally remember what it was called. BACE. I hear that it is no longer being developed? Can someone confirm that? Cant seem to be able to find the forum thread for it.
There is a version of BACE which is balanced for .17 although I cannot find the link to it.
oh the bace, I remember it now i used it in 0.15. it was from nova?, so no more nova's updates for that one but .. i found this
